titles.title: A bill for the relief of Calvin L. Graham.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Courts and Administrative Practice.

bill.summary: 4/26/1988--Introduced. Makes certain determinations regarding the active duty service, conditions of discharge, and injuries of a named World War II veteran for purposes of laws administered by the Veterans Administration. Directs the Administrator of Veterans Affairs to reimburse costs incurred in the treatment of dental injuries suffered by such individual, such payment to be in full satisfaction of any claim against the United States for benefits to which he would otherwise be entitled. Directs the Secretary of the Treasury to pay interest to such individual based upon amounts of basic pay and mustering-out payments, such sum to be in full satisfaction of any claim against the United States for basic pay and mustering-out payment amounts.
